merged_data.item: Earrings, Combination of Silver Studs and Gold Hoops
merged_data.details: Minimalist circular studs with smooth dome face; standard post and butterfly clutch backs. Worn as a subtle accent with no pendant movement. Minimal sleeper-style hoops worn at the lobes; approximately 12–18 mm outer diameter with 1.5–2 mm wire gauge; rounded cross-section; continuous hinged closure with invisible joint; hinged click-top closure; no texture, stones, or pendants; mirror-finish polish.
